trans-unit.source: Provides a simple implementation of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IServiceContainer"></xref> interface.
trans-unit.target: Fornece uma implementação simple do <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IServiceContainer"> </xref> interface.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Esta classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: The ServiceContainer object can be used to store and provide services.
trans-unit.target: O objeto ServiceContainer pode ser utilizado para armazenar e fornecer serviços.

trans-unit.source: ServiceContainer implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IServiceContainer> interface.
trans-unit.target: ServiceContainer implementa o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IServiceContainer>interface.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IServiceContainer>

trans-unit.source: The ServiceContainer object can be created using a constructor that adds a parent <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IServiceContainer> through which services can be optionally added to or removed from all parent <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IServiceContainer> objects, including the immediate parent <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IServiceContainer>.
trans-unit.target: O objeto ServiceContainer pode ser criado utilizando um construtor que adiciona um principal <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IServiceContainer>através do qual serviços podem ser, opcionalmente, adicionados ou removidos de principal todos os <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IServiceContainer>objetos, incluindo o elemento principal imediato <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IServiceContainer>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IServiceContainer> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IServiceContainer> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IServiceContainer>

trans-unit.source: To add or remove a service from all <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IServiceContainer> implementations that are linked to this <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IServiceContainer> through parenting, call the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer.AddService%2A> or <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer.RemoveService%2A> method overload that accepts a Boolean value indicating whether to promote the service request.
trans-unit.target: Para adicionar ou remover um serviço a todos os <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IServiceContainer>implementações que estão ligadas a este <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IServiceContainer>através de parenting, chame o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer.AddService%2A>ou <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer.RemoveService%2A>sobrecarga do método que aceita um valor de Booleano indicando se pretende promover o pedido de serviço.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer.RemoveService%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer.AddService%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IServiceContainer> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IServiceContainer>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute> attribute applied to this class has the following <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute.Resources%2A> property value: <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionResource>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute>atributo aplicado para esta classe tem o seguinte <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute.Resources%2A>valor da propriedade: <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionResource>.</xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionResource> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute.Resources%2A> </xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute> does not affect desktop applications (which are typically started by double-clicking an icon, typing a command, or entering a URL in a browser).
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute>não afeta as aplicações de ambiente de trabalho (que normalmente são iniciadas por um ícone de fazendo duplo clique, escrevendo um comando ou introduzir um URL num browser).</xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute> class or [SQL Server Programming and Host Protection Attributes](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte o <xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute>classe ou [programação do SQL Server e os atributos de proteção do anfitrião](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Security.Permissions.HostProtectionAttribute>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer"></xref> class using the specified parent service provider.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer"> </xref> classe utilizando o fornecedor de serviço principal especificado.

trans-unit.source: The service container uses this service object provider to retrieve services, if they are not available locally in the container.
trans-unit.target: O contentor de serviços utiliza este fornecedor de objeto de serviço para obter os serviços, se não estiverem disponíveis localmente no contentor.

trans-unit.source: A parent service provider.
trans-unit.target: Um fornecedor de serviço principal.

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified service to the service container.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona o serviço especificado para o contentor de serviços.

trans-unit.source: The type of service to add.
trans-unit.target: O tipo de serviço para adicionar.

trans-unit.source: A callback object that can create the service.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto de chamada de retorno que pode criar o serviço.

trans-unit.source: This allows a service to be declared as available, but delays creation of the object until the service is requested.
trans-unit.target: Isto permite que um serviço de ser declarado como disponíveis, mas atrasa a criação do objeto até que o serviço for solicitado.

trans-unit.source: serviceType or callback is .
trans-unit.target: serviceTypeor callback is .

trans-unit.source: A service of type serviceType already exists in the container.
trans-unit.target: Um serviço do tipo serviceType já existe no contentor.

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified service to the service container.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona o serviço especificado para o contentor de serviços.

trans-unit.source: The type of service to add.
trans-unit.target: O tipo de serviço para adicionar.

trans-unit.source: An instance of the service to add.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância do serviço para adicionar.

trans-unit.source: This object must implement or inherit from the type indicated by the `serviceType` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Este objeto tem de implementar ou Herdar do tipo indicado pelo `serviceType` parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: serviceType or serviceInstance is .
trans-unit.target: serviceTypeor serviceInstance is .

trans-unit.source: A service of type serviceType already exists in the container.
trans-unit.target: Um serviço do tipo serviceType já existe no contentor.

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified service to the service container.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona o serviço especificado para o contentor de serviços.

trans-unit.source: The type of service to add.
trans-unit.target: O tipo de serviço para adicionar.

trans-unit.source: A callback object that can create the service.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto de chamada de retorno que pode criar o serviço.

trans-unit.source: This allows a service to be declared as available, but delays creation of the object until the service is requested.
trans-unit.target: Isto permite que um serviço de ser declarado como disponíveis, mas atrasa a criação do objeto até que o serviço for solicitado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this service should be added to any parent service containers; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se este serviço deve ser adicionado a quaisquer contentores principal do serviço; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: serviceType or callback is .
trans-unit.target: serviceTypeor callback is .

trans-unit.source: A service of type serviceType already exists in the container.
trans-unit.target: Um serviço do tipo serviceType já existe no contentor.

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified service to the service container.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona o serviço especificado para o contentor de serviços.

trans-unit.source: The type of service to add.
trans-unit.target: O tipo de serviço para adicionar.

trans-unit.source: An instance of the service type to add.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância do tipo de serviço para adicionar.

trans-unit.source: This object must implement or inherit from the type indicated by the `serviceType` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Este objeto tem de implementar ou Herdar do tipo indicado pelo `serviceType` parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this service should be added to any parent service containers; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se este serviço deve ser adicionado a quaisquer contentores principal do serviço; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: serviceType or serviceInstance is .
trans-unit.target: serviceTypeor serviceInstance is .

trans-unit.source: A service of type serviceType already exists in the container.
trans-unit.target: Um serviço do tipo serviceType já existe no contentor.

trans-unit.source: Gets the default services implemented directly by <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém os serviços de predefinição implementados diretamente pelo <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This property returns the default services that are implemented directly on this <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IServiceContainer>.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade devolve os serviços de predefinidos que são implementados diretamente no <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IServiceContainer>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IServiceContainer>

trans-unit.source: the default implementation of this property is to return the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IServiceContainer> and <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer> types.
trans-unit.target: a implementação de predefinição desta propriedade é devolver o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IServiceContainer>e <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer>tipos.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IServiceContainer>

trans-unit.source: You may override this property and return your own types, modifying the default behavior of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.GetService%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Pode ignorar esta propriedade e os seus próprios tipos, modificar o comportamento predefinido de <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.GetService%2A>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.GetService%2A> de retorno

trans-unit.source: The default services.
trans-unit.target: Os serviços de predefinição.

trans-unit.source: Disposes this service container.
trans-unit.target: Disposes este contentor de serviços.

trans-unit.source: Dispose walks all instantiated services within the container and disposes any that implement <xref:System.IDisposable>, and clears the service list.
trans-unit.target: Dispose ajuda-o com todas as instâncias serviços no contentor e quaisquer disposes que implemente <xref:System.IDisposable>e limpa a lista de serviço.</xref:System.IDisposable>

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer.Dispose%2A> when you are finished using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer>.
trans-unit.target: É possível chamar <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer.Dispose%2A>Quando tiver terminado de utilizando <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer.Dispose%2A> method leaves the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer.Dispose%2A>método mantém o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer>num Estado não utilizável.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: After calling <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer.Dispose%2A>, you must release all references to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: Após a chamada <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer.Dispose%2A>, tem de libertar todas as referências ao <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer>para que o recoletor de lixo pode reclame a memória que a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer>foi occupying.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [recursos não geridos limpeza](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) e [implementar um método eliminar](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer.Dispose%2A> before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Sempre chamar <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer.Dispose%2A>antes de libertar a última referência <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, os recursos que está a utilizar não irão ser libertados até que as chamadas de recoletor de lixo a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer>do objeto `Finalize` método.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer>

trans-unit.source: Disposes this service container.
trans-unit.target: Disposes este contentor de serviços.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer.Dispose%2A> walks all instantiated services within the container and disposes any that implement <xref:System.IDisposable>, and clears the service list.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer.Dispose%2A>ajuda-o com todas as instâncias serviços no contentor e quaisquer disposes que implemente <xref:System.IDisposable>e limpa a lista de serviço.</xref:System.IDisposable></xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()`method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Este método é denominado pelo público `Dispose()`método e o <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>método.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()`invoca protegida `Dispose(Boolean)` método com o `disposing` parâmetro definido como `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>invoca `Dispose` com `disposing` definido como `false`.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer> references.
trans-unit.target: Quando o `disposing` parâmetro for true, este método versões retidos por quaisquer objetos geridos de todos os recursos que este <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer>referências.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Este método invoca o `Dispose()` método de cada objeto referenciado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer"></xref> is in the process of being disposed of; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.ServiceContainer"> </xref> está a ser eliminado do; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the requested service.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o serviço pedido.

trans-unit.source: The type of service to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: O tipo de serviço a obter.

trans-unit.source: An instance of the service if it could be found, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if it could not be found.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância do serviço se foi encontrado, ou <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> se não foi possível encontrar.

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified service type from the service container.
trans-unit.target: Remove o tipo de serviço especificado do contentor de serviços.

trans-unit.source: The type of service to remove.
trans-unit.target: O tipo de serviço para remover.

trans-unit.source: serviceType is .
trans-unit.target: serviceTypeis .

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified service type from the service container.
trans-unit.target: Remove o tipo de serviço especificado do contentor de serviços.

trans-unit.source: The type of service to remove.
trans-unit.target: O tipo de serviço para remover.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this service should be removed from any parent service containers; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se este serviço deve ser removido da quaisquer contentores principal do serviço; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: serviceType is .
trans-unit.target: serviceTypeis .
